data.text:
Taking Control

Alicia has to choose between her marriage to Peter and pursuing a future with Will; a judge appoints Alicia to represent a man accused of murdering his business partner.

Volunteers

When the remains of two women are found under a building, Rush suspects they may have been killed for working at an abortion clinic.

Rivals

Quark gets some competition when a slick con artist opens a gambling club on the Promenade; the station suffers strange problems that are normally highly unlikely to occur.

Choreographed

After Danielle Masoner dies in Central Park, Stabler follows the leads to a homeless man who turns out to be a better witness than he thought. Paired up again with Benson, Stabler investigates her death, but it keeps bringing up memories of Dani Beck for him. During the course of the investigation, Benson and Stabler learn that Danielle's husband was sleeping with a friend of theirs.
